#summary Overview of the common methods of entering data into the RedR session.

= Introduction =

Getting data into RedR is essential for data processing and manipulation.  Here we show examples of how to use the DataEntry and ReadFiles widgets.

= Screen-Cast =

The ReadFiles widget is used to read data into RedR from a tab-delimited file.

<wiki:video url="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u55EQSOUZj4"/>

The DataEntry widget is used to enter data manually into the RedR session.  This widget can also be used to modify data that was previously read into RedR.

<wiki:vedio url="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W3BMmaraI0c"/>
